title: Free help and advice for new players

replies.body:

Perhaps wait until you are at least in Ranked before offering your help.

obviously this is a smurf account lol, also i noticed You're in bronze 4, if you need help getting out of that elo or just wanna discuss anything regarding macro, climbing etc add me

IGN is DeathBeforeHonor

Climbing is not really the issue for me. When I focus and actually try, I solo carry. What I lack in mechanics, my macro makes up for. I've been told I can make it to Gold with my current skill (with a few tweaks here and there).

The problem is my perfectionist mentality. If I or a teammate make even the slightest mistake, I either Alt+F4 or AFK Farm until our Nexus is destroyed. And then I'm tilted for the next game, which worsens my mentality, and then I end up running it down Bot with AP Nasus Support.

*(When I play Evelynn, that is... This does not apply to any other champion with perhaps 1 or 2 Junglers that I get by on macro)*
